turns.text: Okay um lets see How do you feel about credit cards
turns.label: o

turns.text: Personally I do not care for them Uh although I find them necessity in business and so forth I I try to refrain from their use as much as possible Um for number of reasons one of which is the you know extreme interest rate on most of them
turns.label: sd

turns.text: The one I use uh of course for mostly only for business purposes is uh you know American Express
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And uh Im not Im not terribly in favor of them Not for my own personal uh point of view
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Plus it uh has you know from an economic point of view it has increased our debt --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- to the tune of somewhere on the order of five to ten billion I believe --
-- uh at least thats one number for this range of numbers I have I have heard
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Do you use them frequently or -
turns.label: qy

turns.text: Well we uh me and my wife when when we have like extra money that we know were going to have and we can put it in our budget yeah well well use it But like last year I think we paid - I think it was like twenty something cents interest on our Visa
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And I think this this year we uh I think we used it for Christmas and we got caught just few days on our grace period And uh so well pay little interest this year but maybe two dollars But we dont like to do that at all
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And you know we I think we feel about the same way you do real strongly We uh we have several credit cards though We have gas card our Visa and then of course the American Express and I think we have couple of department stores
turns.label: sd

turns.text: But we use it the same way and uh -
turns.label: sd

turns.text: I find the one I use mostly uh - aside from the American Express I do use my Sears card
turns.label: sd

turns.text: But uh I try - as with the American Express I try to pay it you know as it comes in
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Its its not uncommon for us to have paid it before we even get the bill Thats usually how we do it
turns.label: sd

turns.text: I know when I travel or when I used to travel overseas quite bit what I would do on my American Express card is before I would before I left I would mail check to to American Express --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- and you know have some idea of how much was there you know Id sent them you know several hundred dollars or whatever --
But uh for hotels and and so forth But uh but I knew that it was paid I knew --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- I knew that I had that much --
-- credit going in Sometimes you know sometimes I would go over but it wouldnt you know it wouldnt hit me in big in big way because --
-- I knew that uh I would have it covered in that respect
Right Thats good Ive I dont think weve gone that far to pay it in ad- you know in advance before we spend it but I guess if you foresaw that you were going to have to use it that like that
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- I found in um in traveling overseas --
-- that uh often it would uh it would expedite things to have an American Express credit card --
-- for hotel bills and so forth
Plus I would uh when they uh would send the bill they would automatically convert to the exchange rate
turns.label: sd

turns.text: So now the only time that got to be problem was if the exchange rate changed drastically
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Uh for example I remember on one trip to France when I started planning the trip I think uh dollar was worth nine or ten francs -- This looks like funny parsing to me Shouldnt francs be part of previous utt and B64 with its coordinating conjunction and indep clause start new slash unit

turns.text: -- and just in matter of week or two the dollar fell against the franc drastically See note on B62 utt2 above And whe- when I finally got over there it had fallen uh two or three francs to the dollar So the -
So I got caught little short --

turns.text: -- uh I I was anticipating you know my room would cost uh lets say - if it were say sixty or seventy francs night --
-- that would mean it would be about ten dollars or so or maybe twenty dolls- maybe it would be more than that It was more than It would average out to thirty-five or forty dollars night --
